branchCategory.name: Moisture Control Tubing
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's IDK series is a moisture control tube.&nbsp; Condensation in a pneumatic system will cause operating failure and affect the life of&nbsp;pneumatic equipment.&nbsp; The IDK prevents condensation in small cylinders, air grippers, and air operated valves by diffusing water vapor in the piping to the outside before it is condensed.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: IDK
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's IDK series is a moisture control tube.&nbsp; Condensation in a pneumatic system will cause operating failure and affect the life of&nbsp;pneumatic equipment.&nbsp; The IDK prevents condensation in small cylinders, air grippers, and air operated valves by diffusing water vapor in the piping to the outside before it is condensed.&nbsp;</p>
